Fix: High priority issues - Custom alerts, secure storage, error boundary, race conditions

Fixed 4 high priority bugs from ROADMAP.md:

1. Web Alert Dialogs - Replace window.alert/confirm with custom modal
   - Created CustomAlert component with beautiful UI
   - Applied to all screens (Login, Register, Settings, Header, Chat, etc.)

2. API Key Security - Move from plain state to secure storage
   - Created secureStorage service with obfuscation
   - API keys now stored in sessionStorage with XOR encryption
   - Updated aiService to use async secure storage

3. Error Boundary Context - Add more debugging information
   - Enhanced error display with component stack, timestamps
   - Added error count tracking and user agent info
   - "Try Again" and "Reload App" action buttons

4. Message Editing Race Condition - Prevent edits during AI response
   - Block edit/delete operations when isLoading=true
   - Auto-cancel editing when AI starts responding
   - Clear user feedback via alerts

All changes tested and building successfully.
